General.Name: Mkango Resources Ltd
General.Description: Mkango Resources Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, explores for and develops rare earth elements and associated minerals in the Republic of Malawi, Africa. It explores for uranium, tantalum, niobium, zircon, nickel, cobalt, rutile, corundum, graphite, gold ores, and base metals. The company's flagship project is the Songwe Hill property within the Phalombe exploration license located in southeast Malawi. It also holds 100% interests in the Thambani, Nkalonje Hill, Chimimbe Hill, and Mchinji licenses. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A3
